summary: Completed admin panel setup: installed dependencies, created .env file, fixed Prisma schema (removed @db.Text annotations for SQLite compatibility), generated Prisma client, ran database migrations, seeded database with translations, and started development server on port 3000.
current_status: Admin panel is fully set up and running. Database initialized with migrations and seeded with translations from public/locales. Development server started on http://localhost:3000. Ready to access at /login with default password 'admin123'.
